processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value

advice.text: Start turning your comments into code: implement the loop that visits each number from 1 to n.
Inside the loop, check whether the current number divides n and update the running sum when it does.
After finishing the loop, print the sum and test with inputs like 6 (expect 12) and 10 (expect 18) to verify results.
